official_title: A bill to designate the visitors center in the Mississippi District of the Gulf Islands National Seashore as the William M. Colmer Visitors Center.

summary.text: Designates a specified building in the Mississippi district of the Gulf Islands National Seashore as the William M. Colmer Visitors Center.
